shridharan mahathage kilinochchiye pihiti paksha karyalaye thibiyadi soyagath thrastha wimarshana eekakaya manthriwarayage sambandhikarana lekamwarayada pereda (12) athadanguwata gena atha.shri dharan mahathage thrastha wimarshana eekakaya wisin me athadanguwata ganima sidu kala bawa yuda hamuda madhya prakashaka brigediyar ruwan wanigasuriya mahatha pawasiya.pupurana drawya ragena yamin thibu thri roda rathayak pariksha kirimedi in labu thorathuru anuwa thrastha wimarshana eekakaye niladharin wisin kilinochchiye pihiti shri dharan mahathage deshapalana paksha karyalaya pariksha kirimedi pupura drawya samanga sambandhikarana lekamwaraya athadanguwata gath bawa brigediyar ruwan wanigasuriya mahatha kiweya.athadanguwata gath drawya athara kantha chayarupa, upath palana kopu ha rajayata mada gasimata sakas kala thorathuru adangu sanyuktha thati thogayak thibunu bawada ee mahatha prakasha kaleya.wadidura parikshana thrastha wimarshana eekakaya mangin sidu karana bawada yuda hamuda madhya prakashakawaraya pawasiya..
